entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: True to his word, Pall gave you a customization kit for your speeder.
entries.journal_entry_description: Find Pall and talk to him. Han says he'll give you a customization kit for your speeder.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Han may be getting interference from Jabba or Boba Fett, but something is making it difficult for him to make contact with you.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Han Solo is Trying to Contact You
entries.task01_comm_message_text: Sorry, someone was jamming me. Anyway, now that you have a speeder, why don't you speed back into town and see my friend Pall. He can give you a customization kit for it.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Han Solo knows a guy who might be able to give you a customization kit for your new speeder. Go talk to him and see if he can help you out.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Talk to Pall and see if he can give you a customization kit for your new speeder.
